page.title: 05FARMING - INTERVIEW ONE(ctd)
page.content: This year the crops were wheat,barley,peas,sugar beet,oil seed rape and grassland for grazing and hay.Their daughter rears horses. In 1948 there were 10 people employed on the farm. In 1985 there are 6. In 1939 horses were used for ploughing. Today this farm has 5 tractors,1 fork lift,1 combine harvester and 1 lorry. Up to 1979 there were 120 ewes which had 200 lambs.Today there are no sheep.Oil seed rape is the only crop which has recently been added to the crops previously grown. When the farmer's wife first lived in the house she had to clean oil lamps and cook on a fire. The family love living on the farm.They have a two-week holiday abroad every two or three years.They have three cats and one collie dog.
